description: The family that runs this excellent restaurant with views of the surrounding countryside has been doing so with passion and experience for over a century. The menu here focuses on the culinary traditions of Lazio, while the wine and extra-virgin olive oil are also sourced locally. The restaurant is part of a hotel and includes a shop (La Bottega delle Delizie) selling home-made produce.
